title: One Piece Episode #644 Anime Review
author: The Fandom Post
description: A detailed review of Episode 644 covering both the Thousand Sunny subplot with Giolla and the Block C battle in the Corrida Colosseum. Notes that the episode focuses heavily on Giolla's attack on the Sunny while giving shorter but impactful time to Luffy's arena battles.

title: One Piece Episodes 640-644: Cut Hose
author: The Going Merry: A One Piece Review Podcast
description: The Going Merry podcast covers episodes 640-644, discussing the Straw Hats spreading across Dressrosa, Violet's betrayal of the Donquixote Family, and Luffy's fight in Block C beginning. The podcast analyzes character development and arc progression.

title: One Piece Episode 644 - A Blow of Anger! A Giant vs. Lucy!
author: Crunchyroll
description: Official streaming of Episode 644 on Crunchyroll, featuring both the Thousand Sunny attack by Giolla and the Block C tournament battle between Lucy and Hajrudin.

title: Episode 644 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 644 containing plot summary, character appearances, trivia, and production details.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Wiki contains links and references to future episodes and arcs

title: One Piece Episode 644 on IMDb
author: IMDb
description: IMDb page for Episode 644 titled 'Ikari no Ichigeki! Kyojin vs Lucy' with user ratings, cast information, and episode details. Currently rated 7.9/10.

title: 643-644: Shaking Heaven and Earth! Admiral Fujitora's Power! and A Blow of Anger! A Giant vs Lucy!
author: Never Watched One Piece (Tumblr)
description: A fan blog reviewing episodes 643-644 together, noting 'unexpected feels and reveals' particularly regarding the bull character Brutal (Ucy) and the emotional impact of Luffy's protective rage.

title: A Blow of Anger! A Giant vs. Lucy! - One Piece Season 17, Episode 16
author: Apple TV
description: Official streaming of Episode 644 on Apple TV with English subtitles and dub options.
